original_text: Instead, they have done whatever they wanted to do. They have served the gods of Baal, as their ancestors taught them to do.’
korean_text: 그 마음의 완악함을 따라 그 조상들이 자기에게 가르친 바알들을 따랐음이라

sentences.original_text: Instead, they have done whatever they wanted to do
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 그들은 자기들이 하고 싶은 것은 무엇이든 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: They have served the gods of Baal
as their ancestors taught them to do
